reviews.review_msg: Rick is a pretty chill guy. The fact that he makes an effort to try and get to know everyone is rare. I especially enjoy his Christmas sweater with the reindeers prancing across it. You're in for a treat!

Rick is a fantastic teacher! His course is very interesting and he always willing to help. He goes out of his way to get to know his students, and coordinates field trips to make the course more interesting. A reasonable marker too. Expect some math if you're an arts person.

Man... this guy and his fishes. He's ok, his midterm is a bit unclear. don't both buying the costom courseware, you don't really need it. And prepare for a lot of printing, because he puts his notes on the webct.
This was a very interesting course. You can learn much if you want to, and you'll get a decent grade without much effort. Easiest midterm I've ever seen, and he grades papers nicely too. Great guy!
Interesting material that he shares through pictures and discusses with the class. Always wants feedback, open to comments. Midterm was a little unclear in questioning but the course was taught well.

Great guy!! Knows all his students by name. Wants everyone to be interested in what they are learning. Knows what he's talking about... DDT, PCB, CFC...etc... could talk a little bit less about the fishies... but that's what he loves so ya can't blame him
